Fried eggs with bread.title: Russian Grenki - Fried Eggs with Bread
ingredients: Slices of bread (baguette or white bread)
instructions: Beat eggs with milk and sugar until sugar dissolves
Soak each bread slice in the milk-egg mixture
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat
Fry bread slices on both sides until golden brown
Season with salt and serve hot

Banana with peanut butter.title: Banana with Peanut Butter Snack
instructions: Slice bananas into rounds or keep whole
Spread peanut butter generously on banana slices
Drizzle with honey if desired
Sprinkle with cinnamon for extra flavor
Serve immediately

Chicken soup with vegetables.title: Russian Chicken Soup with Vegetables
ingredients: 1 whole chicken or chicken drumsticks (1-1.5 kg)
instructions: Rinse chicken and place in a large pot with water
Bring to boil, cook for 10 minutes, removing impurities
In a skillet, sauté onions with oil and butter until soft
Add grated carrots to onions, cook until tender
Add sautéed vegetables to the soup pot
Add diced potatoes and cook until tender
Season with salt, pepper, and fresh dill
Simmer for 20-30 minutes, serve hot

Dim sum dumplings.title: Dim Sum Asian Dumplings
ingredients: Optional: spicy peanut sauce for serving
instructions: Mix ground pork with red curry, garam masala, and cilantro
Season with soy sauce and sesame oil
Place a spoonful of filling in center of each wrapper
Fold and pleat edges to seal dumplings
Prepare steamer with boiling water
Steam dumplings for 8-10 minutes until cooked through
Serve with spicy peanut sauce

Ryebread with butter.title: Ryebread with Butter
ingredients: Slices of rye bread (Borodinsky or dark rye)
Optional: garlic cloves for garlic butter
instructions: Slice rye bread into thick pieces
Butter can be softened and spread directly
For garlic butter: mix softened butter with minced garlic
Spread butter generously on bread slices
Can be served as is or lightly toasted
Serve as a simple snack or side dish

Japanese ramen.title: Miso Ramen
ingredients: Chashu pork slices or soft-boiled eggs
Optional: butter slices for miso butter ramen
instructions: Bring broth to a simmer in a pot
Stir in miso paste until dissolved
Add soy sauce and sesame oil
Cook ramen noodles separately according to package
Divide noodles into serving bowls
Ladle hot broth over noodles
Top with chashu pork, eggs, green onions, and nori
Serve immediately while hot

Rice porridge with pickles.title: Congee (Chinese Rice Porridge)
instructions: Rinse rice until water runs clear
Combine rice, stock, ginger, and salt in large pot
Bring to boil, then reduce to low simmer
Cook for 1-1.5 hours, stirring occasionally
Rice should break down into creamy porridge
Remove ginger slices
Ladle into bowls and add desired toppings
Drizzle with sesame oil and serve hot

Seaweed snacks.title: Roasted Seaweed Snacks
ingredients: Optional: chili powder or garlic powder
instructions: Preheat oven to 300°F (150°C)
Cut nori sheets into smaller squares
Brush lightly with sesame oil
Sprinkle with sea salt
Bake for 5-8 minutes until crispy
Let cool completely before serving
Store in airtight container to maintain crispiness

Pelmeni with sour cream.title: Russian Pelmeni (Meat Dumplings)
ingredients: For dough: 2 cups flour, 1/2 tsp salt
For dough: 1 egg, 1/4 cup water, 1 tablespoon sour cream
For filling: 500g ground pork and beef mix
For filling: 1/2 teaspoon salt, pepper to taste
For boiling: 4 cups bone broth or water
instructions: Mix flour and salt in large bowl
Whisk together egg, water, and sour cream
Combine wet and dry ingredients to form dough
Mix ground meat with onion, salt, and pepper
Roll dough thin and cut circles
Place filling in center, fold into half-moon shape
Boil pelmeni in broth for 5-7 minutes until they float
Serve with sour cream and melted butter

Oatmeal with honey and nuts.title: Oatmeal with Honey and Nuts
ingredients: 1/4 cup toasted nuts (walnuts, pecans, or almonds)
instructions: Bring milk or water to a boil
Add oats, reduce heat to low
Simmer for 5-10 minutes, stirring occasionally
Remove from heat, stir in cinnamon and nutmeg
Top with toasted nuts and honey
Add fresh fruits if desired
Serve warm

Pickled ginger and daikon.title: Pickled Ginger and Daikon
ingredients: 400g daikon radish, julienned or sliced thin
instructions: Julienne or thinly slice daikon and ginger
Place vegetables in clean glass jar
In a bowl, mix vinegar, water, sugar, and salt
Stir until sugar and salt dissolve
Pour pickling liquid over vegetables
Press vegetables down so they're submerged
Cover and refrigerate for at least 24 hours
Will keep for 1-2 weeks refrigerated

Shashlik (grilled meat) with salad.title: Russian Shashlik (Grilled Meat Kebabs)
ingredients: 1.5 kg pork shoulder or beef (cut into 2-inch cubes)
For salad: tomatoes, cucumbers, lettuce, dill
Lemon juice and olive oil for salad dressing
instructions: Cut meat into 2-inch cubes
Mix kefir or vinegar with oil, garlic, salt, and pepper
Marinate meat for 4-6 hours or overnight
Thread meat and onion quarters onto skewers
Preheat grill to medium-high heat
Grill shashlik for 10-15 minutes per side
Meanwhile, prepare fresh salad with vegetables and dill
Serve hot with fresh salad and bread
